message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CV, cs.CL, cs.NE 

The paper proposes a novel generative model for learning the order of data instances in datasets. This involves using neural networks to approximate the transition matrix of a Markov chain, which is a common technique in machine learning and falls under the category of deep learning (cs.LG). The paper also evaluates the model's performance on image recognition tasks (cs.CV) and natural language processing tasks (cs.CL), indicating its potential applications in these areas. Additionally, the paper involves training the model using a batch-wise permutation scheme, which is a technique commonly used in reinforcement learning (cs.AI) and optimization (cs.NE).
